reviews.review: The best FPS game out there. Nothing will get your adrenaline pumping more than a clutch scenario. The game is simple once you get the gun play down, and then it opens up to being an extremely tactical and team based game. In over 2k hours I'm still learning and improving every day. I would recommend this ultimate shooter to anyone.

Game client crashes so you get a competitive cooldown. Sounds fair.

UPDATE:

Game client still crashes so you still get a competitive cooldown. Well at least this shit's consistent.

UPDATE 2:

Anti-cheat non-existent. No, scratch that - anti-cheat is an optional opt-in that doesn't do anything. But it's okay, as Valve has monetised it! Unfortunately even the "pay not to play with cheats" option is still full of hackers. Only play if you feel suicidal and need something to push you over the edge.

Trash game. Uninstall.
